idea-plugin.name: Nordish Next
idea-plugin.description:
Variation of Nord theme, modified to suit my personal use case.

Contains:
- Nordish Next color scheme with fixed inheritances and colors adjusted towards less eye-strain
- Oceanic Next Nordified color scheme
- Nordish Darker theme with colors of panels adjusted to be a little darker

Based on original work:
Nord, (c) by Arctic Ice Studio & affiliates
Oceanic Next, (c) by ???
